summary:
Discover the ancient history of the library. Find some secrets and play my first really little quest mod. This mod adds an immersive structure under Windhelm as well as a little quest mod and some secrets.
If you like the mod please consider to come back for endorsing the mod.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/titlejnfgi7a4zv.png[/img]


[u][b]Requirements:[/b][/u]
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) Skyrim
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) The latest patch


[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/descriptionl30p9y1ki5.png[/img]

I am proud to present you my very first quest mod. I thought I would like to combine my passion for house mods and new locations into a new mod. I also included some of my first selfmade scripts. I hope you like what I did here and you enjoy the mod as much as I enjoyed it to create it.
The mod is fully integrated into the actual game and offers something I always missed at the oldest city of Skyrim. You can use the library of course as a house, as you always can with my mods. The quest is really short, so be not to harsh with me. It was my first quest mod ever. You don't have
to worry about the scripts. They are all checked by me and other programmers and are save to run.
I hope you enjoy the backstory and the hidden treasure that comes with the mod!!
Yes there is a artifact (BIG THANKS to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2931683/?]RonnieMagnum[/url]) hidden!! Try to find it.
As always you will find of course the heavy level of deatil and also some nice lightning.

[color=#0066ff]Start the quest[/color]
Just wait for the courier to come. He will find you I am sure!

[center][i][b]If you like the mod please consider to come back and endorse it![/b][/i][/center]


[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/features1mg32j9xpf.png[/img]

This time I thought I may not describe all features of the mod as you have to discover it yourself.
I will describe here shortly the most important features of the mod.

[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) Simple and well thought entrance (shouldn't conflict with other mods)
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) A unique connection between the rooms (you can look down the hole in the floor)
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) The first room has 2 candles in the conrer which you can lite up by activate them
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) The library is really well designed with a lot of nice placed eye candies
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) In the library are 4 torches which you can activate by clicking them. They are between some bookshelfs.
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) A unique backstory, which is fully immersive!!
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) A unusual merchant
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) You can decide to keep the merchant or remove him!!
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) A place to sleep
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) A place to cook
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) Some weapon plaques and holders
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) Enchanting and alchemy stations
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) A secret exit or entrance (will be shown on the map once you discover it)
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) A quest
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) A hidden artifact in a hard to find location (I hope)
[color=#ff9999][b]O[/b][/color]) An awsome and humble atmosphere


[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/installationjrus40h9o7.png[/img]

Klick on the download with NMM manager button and install the mod.

[b][u]Manual:[/u][/b]
If you want to install this mod manually, you have to download it and unpack the archive somewhere. After you unpacked it drop the The Library.esp, .bsl and .bsa into your Skyrim/Data folder. Later on chose your prefered launcher and activate the .esp.


[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/uninstallatione8u0gs4c91.png[/img]

Again I suggest using the NMM, which provides a much easier way to handle mods.

NMM:
Deactivate the mod in the NMM mod list and delete it afterwards.

Manual:
Remove the The Library.esp, .bsl and .bsa from your Skyrim/Data folder.

[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/faq0i7mdosl9b.png[/img]

[color=#0066ff]Q: Is this mod cleaned with TES5Edit?[/color]
A: Yes ofc. it was cleaned and checked with it.

[color=#0066ff]Q: How do I start the quest?[/color]
A: Wait for the courier to bring you a letter

[color=#0066ff]Q: Could you add this and that for me?[/color]
A: Just post it in the comments and I'll see what I can do.

[color=#0066ff]Q: The courier seems to not appear?[/color]
A: If this rare issue should happen, please write me a message.


[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/updatesscy87j693w.png[/img]

Reserved for future updates.


[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/credits0ekzh4cixd.png[/img]

Blary for the genious resources I used
Oaristys & Tony67 for their awsome Modders Resource Pack
PAINTINGS and FRAMES created by Artisanix
lillith for the Curio Cabinets
Ynstbih's Rug Resources
BrettM for the FPI Experiment Pack
tueffelachtein for the Misc Resources I used
Vicn for the Object Resource I used
stoverjm for his great new open books resource
RonnieMagnum for letting me use one of his awsome artifacts
All the people from TESA and the offical CK Wiki who helped me with my scripts
Bethesda for creating the game and the CK


size=+2][b]Finally don't forget to enjoy the mod and the game !!![/b][/size]


[b][color=lightred]OtherMods[/color][/b]

Please if you like the mod you should also visit or check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3507075/?]Nahkin's Mods[/url]

Also I suggest you to visit the following awsome house modders or their projects:
[color=#ff9999]o[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/85197/?]dj2005's Mods[/url]

[color=#ff9999]o[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3189192/?]RatFinkk's Mods[/url]

(more to come)
author: Nahkin
